localize.text: To the new manager: I have heard you’re a very valuable employee to the corporation. Please keep up the good work with your great assistant, Angela. You will not find me in this place at the moment, but I believe we will be able to meet each other soon. The Lobotomy Corporation will never forget your devotion and effort. Regards, A, CEO of Lobotomy Corporation.
To the new manager:
I have heard you’re a very valuable employee to the corporation.
Please keep up the good work with your great assistant, Angela.
You will not find me in this place at the moment, but I believe we will be able to meet each other soon.
The Lobotomy Corporation will never forget your devotion and effort.
Regards, A, CEO of Lobotomy Corporation.
You've gotten a document written by A himself?
Perhaps you’re being recognized now.
A is on a long journey currently.
As all journeys have to end, the final destination will be home; which is this place.
Sometimes I imagine myself on a journey too.
Have you ever taken a trip somewhere?
The first thing I want to do if I ever get out of the monitor.
Perhaps human life itself is a long journey?
Accumulating memories while looking at a world I have never seen.
In fact, they say preparing for a trip is a luxury nowadays.
Would be to walk as much as possible, taking in the scenery as if I was capturing a million photos.
Could this moment be a part of the journey for you?
The day is cold still, but we know that the winter is almost over.
Can you see the flowers sprouting through the snow?
This winter was much colder than usual.
However, the end of winter does not necessarily mean spring is coming.
